designData.title: Subscribe & get started
designData.name: Subscribe
designData.caption: Join CodeXSpace and unlock live web dev classes, exclusive resources, and 1:1 support — all under one subscription.

designData.title: Learn by building
designData.name: Learn by building
designData.caption: Jump into real-world projects guided by pros. Build websites, apps, and portfolios that speak louder than certificates.

designData.title: Support that grows with you
designData.name: Support that grows with you
designData.caption: Stuck? Need feedback? Get prompt help, unlimited doubt-solving, and mentorship every step of the way.

capabilitiesCards.title: 1. Interview Preparation
capabilitiesCards.description: Master technical interviews with mock sessions, guidance, and real questions.

capabilitiesCards.title: 2. Hands-on Projects
capabilitiesCards.description: Build real-world web apps to strengthen your portfolio and skills.

capabilitiesCards.title: 3. Premium Resources
capabilitiesCards.description: Access high-quality notes, cheat sheets, and curated learning material — all for free.

capabilitiesCards.title: 4. Personal Guidance
capabilitiesCards.description: Get 1:1 mentorship and support throughout your learning journey.

capabilitiesCards.title: 5. Live Zoom Classes
capabilitiesCards.description: Learn directly from experts in real time, ask doubts instantly, and stay accountable.

capabilitiesCards.title: 6. Affordable Pricing
capabilitiesCards.description: Top-tier content and mentorship at just ₹999 — no hidden costs.

capabilitiesCards.title: 7. Community Access
capabilitiesCards.description: Join a growing community of like-minded learners and developers to network and grow together.

capabilitiesCards.title: 8. Lifetime Access
capabilitiesCards.description: Revisit the course materials and resources anytime, even after completion.

capabilitiesCards.title: 9. Certification
capabilitiesCards.description: Get a certificate upon course completion to showcase your skills and boost your resume.

pricingCards.title: Standard
pricingCards.description: One request at a time. For companies who need on-going design support.

pricingCards.title: Growth
pricingCards.description: Double the requests. For companies with increasing design needs. Limited spots.

pricingCards.title: Basic - Weekly
pricingCards.description: Perfect if you want to try the subscription out or only have a few one-off tasks.

faqData.question: What is the vision of CodeXSpace?
faqData.answer: Our vision is to create the best community of web developers, where learners can grow, collaborate, and thrive in the world of web development.

faqData.question: When will the course start?
faqData.answer: The course start date will be updated very soon! Stay tuned for more information.

faqData.question: What is the cost of the course?
faqData.answer: The course will be very affordable, priced at just ₹999, and includes premium content, live classes, and more to help you become a web development pro.

faqData.question: Are resources and notes paid?
faqData.answer: No, all resources and notes will be completely free for our members. We believe in providing value without additional costs.
